description: You see a few animals roaming around.  Don't feed or charm the animals.
If you mess with a mob in this room, a large mudskipper will come from the sky and land on your head...
{!*SPLAT*
{9I told you!!!
878.name: CoN Pet Shop Storage Room

description: A single, large deep-seated chair stands to the south of the room
where {RCa{rl{Rypso{x, one of the leaders of the {RHo{ra{Rrd{x sits and meets up with
those who requests an audience with the busy man.  Smaller chairs are
lined up in front of the main chair providing seated comfort for those
who seek redress.
846.name: {RCa{rl{Rypso{x's {RAudie{rnce Cha{Rmbers{x

description: {xBefore you, ancient iron gates bar your passage to the fortress.  Its huge walls hide
the secrets of the ancient and secretive clan.  Two guards, dressed in full elven plate
mail and wearing the {8Ins{&ig{8nia of {!The D{1ragon's H{!oard{x, stand guard by the gates.  The
sea air has worn the name that once graced this fortress away; only a few stone letters
can be seen above the gates.
801.name: {BGates Of The {!Fortre{1ss Of Th{!e Hoard{x

description: You are standing in a cold stone hallway, the sound of your
footsteps echoes as you walk.  To the east you hear not a sound
because it is {!Dala{1mar's Lib{!rary{x where some research is
probibally going on and loitering is not prohibited.  To the north
is the {!Stud{1y of the {!Keep{x where {!Ga{1nn{!on{x, {8The{x {!Gui{1ldmas{!ter{x is
training a bunch of new recruits.
808.name: {RCorr{ridor in the {RKeep{x

description: The room is covered in mystic runes and markings, it is equally covered
in blast markings and acid etchings from the incrediblely powerful
mages that have graced this room.  The room is surronded by a magic
field that prevents their magics from destroying the very fortress.
812.name: {RSpel{rls {RRoom{X

description: The walls of the corridors echo off your slightest footsteps as you
proceed deeper into the {RKeep o{rf the Dragon {RHoard{x.  All round you,
doors lead off into different parts of the {RK{reep{x and as you stare
around in bewilderment, you wonder if you will ever find a way out.
835.name: {RCorr{ridor in the {RKeep{x

description: You stand before the Altar of Nightmares, dedicated to Nisstyre.
The altar is totally black, and looks like it is floating.  All around
the altar is black, you can hardly see the walls of the church in the
low light.  The altar stands here, a large challeus sitting on the
altar, a bottle of something next to it.  A large book stands to one
side, bookmarked and open to read.
875.name: {!T{1he {!A{1ltar {!o{1f {bN{8ightmares{9

description: Hidden away from your enemies, you have entered the
celler of the Keep.  A secret pannel slides in place
to block the way back to the stone bridge of
Westbridge.  You are safe here, to the north is the
{!Corr{1idor in the {!Keep{x leading to the rest of the fortress.
807.name: {RDank M{rusty C{Rellar{x

description: As you enter the cluttered and untidy store, you cannot help but
notice that despite its tardiness, shelves covered with stacks of
{Bma{bg{Bical {#weapons {xand {!armor{x line the walls and even before the
shopkeeper approaches you, you know that whatever needs you have for
combat, they will be met here.
816.name: {RWeap{rons Ba{Rzzar{x

description: You walk into the secret passage carved into the stones.  The walls
are a deep shade of black with thick shadows lingering across every
turn.
847.name: The Secret Passage

description: This office is pretty much empty, well...  If you don't count all
the posters of naked women and turtles.
873.name: {RA{rkihiro's {bO{8ffice{x

description: You stand in a large domed room, made of the same strong stone
that supports the rest of the clanhall.  Against the southern wall you
can see a large throne, upon it is the head of a red dragon.  In the
center of the large room you can see a long table, lined with chairs,
with the {8Ins{&ig{8nia {xof {!The D{1ragon's H{!oard {xupon it.
823.name: {!Thr{1one R{!oom{x

description: You walk into the Pawn Shop of Nightmares.  The room is filled with
all kinds of junk fellow clannies have brought in from the wild.  A
old looking dwarf sits among the junk, smoking a cigar, and looking
you.  He must be the pawn shop broker.  There is a window looking to
the east, but that is all you really can see.
852.name: {RT{rhe {bP{8awn {bB{8roker{x

description: You stand within a large circular room, with a bare floor.  You can see
a few pools of dried blood on the floor from a fight.  This is the
{!Aren{1a of the Dra{!gons{x where the {!H{1oar{!d{x has mock battles to hone their
skills to perfection.
822.name: {!Aren{1a of the Dra{!gons{x

description: You stand in the Mage's Room.  A mage sits next to his hearth,
warming up for the night.  A large bed sits to one side, and a long
table, filled with all kinds of different vials and potions.  The walls
are covered in ancient drapes, a collectors item to the mage.  The room
is very warm, and a rug sits on the floor, waiting for you to sit on
it, so the mage can do his work, that he is payed for.
853.name: {!T{1he {!M{1age's {bR{*oom

description: A simple four-walled room surrounds you.  Though the simplicity of
the room itself, its many contents confound even the most learned
wizards of the realms.  Standing across the four walls, deep shelves
tower above you, lined with thick tomes of the arcane arts as well as
secrets best known only to a selected few across the realms.  This is
the sanctum of {RSta{rn{Rwick{x, one of the most respected leaders of the
{RHo{ra{Rrd{x.
837.name: {RSta{rn{Rwick{x's {RSa{rn{Rctum{X

description: Stairs lead up a tower, until you come to the top.  The walls and
floor are all made of dark stone that is etched with symbols of arcane
magic.  Surrounding the center of the room, is a large summoning
circle made of powdered diamonds.
889.name: {RT{rhe {bS{8ummoning {RC{rhamber{9

description: You walk in the dark hallways of the Church Of Nightmares.  On the
walls, diffrent valuables hang, flags, armor, swords, all that kind of
stuff.  Screams of torment can be heard throughout the hall.  Be on
your guard.
854.name: {RT{rhe {RN{rorthern {bH{8allway{x

description: You stand afore an unholy chapel, where priests from the evil gods
gather and offer sacrifices to their gods.  A lone priest, the
representative from the Hoard who has no deep-linked ties with any
god, stands at the door, offering damnation to members of the Hoard
who have lost their way.
834.name: {RThe Unholy{r Church o{Rf the Keep{x

description: You stand in the gathering area of the Church Of Nightmares.  The
walls are made from the same black stone as the church itself.  In the
room you see benches and couches lined up against the wall, sort of a
druggie hangout, as it would look like.  Only dark lighting is in this
room, a few black candles burn on the table in the center of the room.
You see a door to the north, and a portal beneath you.
851.name: {RT{rhe {RG{rathering {bA{8rea{x

description: You are standing in a cold stone hallway, the sound of your
footsteps echoes as you walk.  To the east you see the {!Thr{1one R{!oom{x of
the leaders of {!The D{1ragon's H{!oard{x.  To the north you see
{!The K{1eep of Dra{!gons{x.
806.name: {RCorr{ridor in the {RKeep{x

description: Before you stands a large set of {8Onyx{x doors.  This is the gateway
into the church of the {!L{1ord {!o{1f {4N{8ightmares{x.  Within these walls, the
devout followers of Nisstyre seek his knowlege and power.  The light
here is dimmer, and grows dimmer still.
857.name: {!G{1ate {!t{1o {!t{1he {!C{1hurch {!o{1f {bN{8ightmares{9

description: The Meeting Room, this is where clan members come to speak on clan
affairs.  The room is very cold, and very dark.  A large, round black
table stands in the middle of the room, holding six chairs, one for
each leader.  The walls are covered in diffrent flags.  The main flags
you notice are the TriPower Flag and the Church's Flag.  To the west,
a small portal glows with a green aura.  Through the portal a table
can be seen, with both the DHPK and Church of Nightmares insignias
upon it.
856.name: {RT{rhe {bM{8eeting {RR{room{x

description: Thin, wispy smoke trails the air as one bony finger traces the air,
leading your glance from the door to the gaunt old man who is the
shopkeeper.  Despite his commonplace features, you find that you are
unable to lift your glaze from him, as if you were under a charm
spell.  Perhaps you are...
817.name: {RMyst{rical S{Rhack{x

description: You enter the {RTower o{rf the Drago{Rn Hoard{x.  Even before you enter, a
deep trembling arose from the tail of your spine up your back and into
your head.  Someone, it seems, is bombarding you with {Bm{ba{Bgic{x...  Trying
to control your will and take over your self.  Something is not
right.
824.name: {RTowe{rr of the {RKeep{x

description: You stand in a tunnel.  The walls are well built, and a tourch
hands here giving off light for the area.  To the north a large portal
glows, through it you can see another tunnel leading to some distant
land.  A ladder leads up to a SECRET trap door.
883.name: {RS{recret {RP{rassage {Ro{rut {Ro{rf {Rt{rhe {bH{8all{x

description: You walk into the secret passage carved into the stones.  The walls
are a deep shade of black with thick shadows lingering across every
turn.
843.name: The Secret Passage

description: You stumble across a small niche in the shop, leading to a secret
warehouse.  The dilapidated look and the thick stink of musty air
tells you beyond a doubt that it has been abandoned.
840.name: A small warehouse

description: {*A small pocket of darkness is here.  Carved from the fabric between
reality and the dream world, its a misty shadow of a demi-plane.
A large wooden desk hovers behind it a highbacked chair carved
in the vissage of a grinning Nightmare.   A smaller chair floats before
the desk, for visitors.
879.name: {8A {RF{rree {bR{8oom!{x

description: You stand in the back room of the altar.  Here the supplies of the
church are kept.  A large box sits to one side, locked.
876.name: {RT{rhe {RB{rack {RR{room {RO{rf {RT{rhe {bC{8hurch{x

description: In this room is where the {!H{1oard{!s {xwarriors begin to practice their skills.
Scores of new {8b{&a{7ndi{&t{8s {xand {8f{&o{7rage{&r{8s{x are here fighting and learning
their various combat skills.  In the middle of the room is a large {^T{6i{^tan{x
wielding a {3wooden stick{x with countless battle scars.
810.name: {RTrai{rning {RRoom{x

description: You stand afore a holy chapel, where priests from the goodly gods
gather and offer worship to their gods.  A lone priest, the
representative from the Hoard who has no deep-linked ties with any
god, stands at the door, offering salvation to members of the Hoard
who have lost their way.
833.name: {RThe Holy {rChurch of{R the Keep{x

description: The walls of the corridors echo off your slightest footsteps as you
proceed deeper into the {RKeep o{rf the Dragon{R Hoard{x.  All round you,
doors lead off into different parts of the {RK{reep{x and as you stare
around in bewilderment, you wonder if you will ever find a way out.
821.name: {RCorr{ridor in the {RKeep{x

description: Everywhere you look, the deep {wswirling{x that is the {Dvoid{x that you
have entered fills you with a sense of {wde{Ds{wpair{x, loss and fear.  The
exit is nowhere in sight and the tower which you came from is suddenly
very much a place where you want to be.
828.name: {wA swirling {Dvoid{x

description: You have entered the flag room of the Dragon's Hoard, the most
heavily guarded and innermost secret room in the whole fortress.
Above you is a swirling void from which you came from, in front
of you is the Dragon's Hoard treasure chest.
830.name: {8Flagroom of the {!Drag{1on's H{!oard{9

description: {xYou stand in a tower made of stone.  Within it, the walls and floor
are smooth.  Against the western wall is a large bookshelf, containing
books of dark magic and death.  In the center of the room, you can
see a large pool of {1bl{!oo{1d{x.  In the center is an odd looking man,
carrying a curved blade.  This must be the dark {8Necr{&oma{8ncer{x of the
{!Drag{1on's H{!oard{x, the disciple of {1D{8e{&a{8t{1h{x.
815.name: {!To{1wer {!Of {8B{&on{8e{x

description: You walk into the secret passage carved into the stones.  The walls
are a deep shade of black with thick shadows lingering across every
turn.
848.name: The Secret Passage

description: You have found your way to the bowels of Nisstyre's Tavern, in Westbridge.  Down here
you can't see your hand in front of your face.  {8Complete darkness{x.  You feel the
ladder in your hands and underneath your feet, but that is the only contact you have
with anything tangible.  You don't know how much farther the ladder goes down, but you
KNOW it goes back up.  If you haven't found favor in Nisstyre's eyes, it would be ad-
visable to return from whence you came.
884.name: {RC{rhurch {Ro{rf {bN{8ightmares{x

description: You find yourself in the portal chamber of the Church of
Nightmares.  Looking north you see the eyes of the Dracolich, to the
west Brave knights cower from the fear of Nightmares crawling around
the corner.  You find yourself in the portal chamber of the Church of
Nightmares.  Looking north you see the eyes of the Dracolich while to
the south Brave knights cower from the fear of Nightmares crawling
around the corner.  Upwards is the TriPower Plaza light up the sky
with it's street lights.  While to the down you see the promising
sight of the nightmares that you hold so dear.
{!NORTH: {#Museum{x
{!SOUTH: {#Zozo{x
{!UP: {#Torregiano{x
{!DOWN: {#The Northern Hallway{x
880.name: {bP{*ortal {!R{1oom

description: A sign besides the single large pit in the room catches your eye.
Etched upon this sign and outlined by {Mfa{Ce{Mrie {Rf{ri{Yre{x, the word "{CDonation{x"
blazes brightly against the relative gloominess of the room.
Equipment of all types and sorts line the bottom of the pit, donated
by generous clan members.  Sharply constrasting this serenity, huge
spikes line the back of the room where corpses, still dripping warm
{rbl{Roo{rd{x, have been piked, to stand testimony for the Hoard's efficiency.
832.name: {RDonatio{rn Pit of t{Rhe Keep{x

description: In this room, scores of {8F{&o{7rag{&e{8r{x's are learning
important skills of their trade.  They are practicing with
every type of weapon imaginable on all sorts of targets.
Sparring and basic training are always being conducted here.
To the south the {!Corr{1idor in the {!Keep{x leads to
{!The R{1ealm of Ni{!sstyre{x.  To the east is the
{!Weap{1ons Ba{!zzar{x, where you can purchase your equipment.
814.name: {RStud{ry of the {RKeep{x

description: You've really done it now.  No more ladder, no more light, no more
help.  You just had to see how far the ladder went down didn't you?
Well now you know.  Perhaps if you call upon the name of Nisstyre,
you'll be granted safe passage from this pit...  Perhaps.
892.name: {RT{rhe {RP{rit {Ro{rf {bD{8espair{x

description: In this dark room a few cages stand, within their magical barriers
you can see dark creatures being kept.  At the back of the room a
slender figure can be seen keeping a few of the creatures under
control and feeding others.  As he sees you approaching he stands and
runs over to the counter, preparing for you to purchase one of them.
877.name: {RC{raged {bN{8ightmares {rSouth{x

description: Deep, rumbling roars scream their way out of the many cages as
{Rdr{rago{Rns{x of all sizes and colours shriek angrily against their
confinement.  Even though the might of these mythical creatures, the
cages, made from the best dwarven forges and enchanged by {bN{Disstyre{x
himself, hold fast against their relentless batterings.
818.name: {RStab{rles of the {RKeep{x

description: Everywhere you look, the deep {wswirling{x that is the {Dvoid{x that you
have entered fills you with a sense of {wde{Ds{wpair{x, loss and fear.  The
exit is nowhere in sight and the tower which you came from is suddenly
very much a place where you want to be.
827.name: {wA swirling {Dvoid{x

description: The warehouse abruptly ends here.  The empty wall with its many
holey wooden planks promises no more adventure.
839.name: Far corner of the warehouse

description: Everywhere you look, the deep {wswirling{x that is the {Dvoid{x that you
have entered fills you with a sense of {wde{Ds{wpair{x, loss and fear.  The
exit is nowhere in sight and the tower which you came from is suddenly
very much a place where you want to be.
826.name: {wA swirling {Dvoid{x

description: This room is filled with large fancy pieces of furniture, large
chairs, a desk, bookcases, but alas, it's all a figment of your
imagination.
895.name: {8Shoop Sharpy {RS{rharp's {bO{8ffice{x

description: You are in a small room with walls which enclose around you like a
prison.  Apparently, it has been carved out of the walls of the place,
a secret hiding hole for those in desperate situations.
844.name: The hiding place

description: A constant chanting seems to emit out of the four walls as you
enter the {RSummo{rning Cha{Rmbers{x.  A large circle marked out with {Rdrag{rons'
b{Rlood{x is the single most prominent feature of the room and nothing
else seems to catch your notice as you stare at it's seemingly
simplicity yet confounded complexity.
820.name: {RSummo{rning Cha{Rmbers{x

description: You stand within the true walls of the Church Of Nightmare.  The
church is covered in black, the walls as dark as night, no windows or
lights glowing.  Large, iron pillars reach up from the ground, holding
the roof above, which is invisable in this darkness.  Inbetween the
iron pillars, you see your nightmares, your worse thoughts.  To the
north, a large black alter floats in space.
874.name: {!T{1he {!C{1hurch {!o{1f {bN{8ightmares{9

description: You walk into the secret passage carved into the stones.  The walls
are a deep shade of black with thick shadows lingering across every
turn.
842.name: The Secret Passage

description: You have entered {!Dala{1mar's Lib{!rary{x, and it is full
of rows and rows of bookshelves full of mystical spellbooks
that radiate an immeasurable amount of magic energy.  The
{^li{6b{^rary {!a{1s{!sistant{x quickly dusts off the old tomes and makes sure
nothing bad happnens to them.  Maybe you should say Hi to her...
809.name: {RDala{rmar's Lib{Rrary{x

description: {8The room is lined with trophies.  Various pieces of armor and
weaponry collected from Sylvaniana's adventures line the walls.  The
room has a darkness to it, almost a chill, and prying eyes.  There's a
eerieness to the room.  A mist floats a few feet below the ceiling.
The mist is mind-boggling, entrapping, mystifying.
890.name: {!T{1he {!O{1ffice {!o{1f {4S{8ylvaniana{x

description: All around you beakers and flasks line think granite shelves that
also line the walls of the room.  Lower on the walls you see volumes
and volumes of Magical scrolls and books.  Candles in each of the
corners illuminate a counter and a passage way to the south.  A man in
the back can be seen mixing something together.
863.name: {RP{rotions {Ro{rf {bN{8ightmares{x

description: You walk in the dark hallways of the Church Of Nightmares.  On the
walls, diffrent valuables hang, flags, armor, swords, all that kind of
stuff.  Screams of torment can be heard throughout the hall.  Be on
your guard.
888.name: {RT{rhe {RC{rentral {bH{8allway{x

description: The opulence of the room astounds you as you enter the private
throne room of the clan's most prominent leader, {RRe{ri{Rsen{x.  A deep
seated throne lies to the north of the room, its simple design
contradicts the aura of magificance which it exudes.
836.name: {RRe{ri{Rsen{x's {RThro{rne {RRoom{X

description: Everywhere you look, the deep {wswirling{x that is the {Dvoid{x that you
have entered fills you with a sense of {wde{Ds{wpair{x, loss and fear.  The
exit is nowhere in sight and the tower which you came from is suddenly
very much a place where you want to be.
829.name: {wA swirling {Dvoid{x

description: You stand in the center of a pentagram drawn on the floor in {rbl{Roo{rd{x.
A few wizards can be seen muttering in some arcane tongue, but you
cant understand it and quickly dismiss it.  Suddenly they start
chanting and a voice enters your mind...
{r| {mWest   {r| {MTorregiano     {r|
{r| {yDown   {r| {MZozo MiB Tower {r|
{r| {RNorth  {r| {MMuseum         {r|
831.name: {RRoo{rm of Port{Rals{x

description: Large charts of the realms cover the table tops of the many tables
in this huge room.  A single conjured sphere of light sits in the
middle of the room, with the details of the lands around depicted in
magically enhanced details.
845.name: {REr{rk{Remis{x' {RBattle{r Plannin{Rg Room{x

description: You stand outside the Church Of Nighmares, or more the living
corridors of its followers.  The doors are created from a dark wood,
and look very old.  They are shut tight.  The steps here look worn,
and walked on.  Back south is the courtyard.
850.name: {8The {RI{rnner {RH{ralls {Ro{rf {bN{8ightmares{x

description: You walk into the secret passage carved into the stones.  The walls
are a deep shade of black with thick shadows lingering across every
turn.
849.name: The Secret Passage

description: {8Upon entering the door, it {Rd{risappears{8, what is left is a large
room.  Approximately 25 feet long, and the same wide.  The walls,
ceiling and floor are all made of a strong black stone, {Wsmooth{8 to the
touch.  In the center of the room is a large desk made of Magewood and
a large {Wb{8lack throne sits behind it, the throne of {RT{rsaroth{8.  {9
891.name: {RT{rhe {bO{8ffice {Ro{rf {RT{rsaroth{9

description: In this room is where the {!H{1oard{!s {xwarriors begin to practice their skills.
Scores of new {8b{&a{7ndi{&t{8s {xand {8f{&o{7rage{&r{8s {xare here fighting and learning
their various combat skills.  In the middle of the room is a small {%P{^i{5x{5i{Be{x
wielding a {3wooden stick{x with her wings riped off.
811.name: {!Trai{1ning R{!oom{x

description: Everywhere you look, the deep {wswirling{x that is the {Dvoid{x that you
have entered fills you with a sense of {wde{Ds{wpair{x, loss and fear.  The
exit is nowhere in sight and the tower which you came from is suddenly
very much a place where you want to be.
825.name: {wA swirling {Dvoid{x

description: You stand in the Training room of the Church of Nightmares.  The
room is filled with all diffrent kinds of training equipment.  The
most noticable is the dual-dummies hanging in one corner.  The
basement of the fortress is very dark, and very wet.  The sounds of
dripping water echos around you, and the stone walls seem to be wet.
To the south, you see a vast arena.
{RSOUTH:{Y Clan Friendly PK Arena{x
858.name: {RT{rhe {bT{8raining {RR{room{x

description: {RThe R{realm of Ni{Rsstyre{x is truely wonderful to behold. A huge
statue of our founder, {bN{Disstyre{x is {rbl{Ree{rding{x into a small bowl in the
center of the room.  Off to the side is a fountain, gently bubbling,
spouting forth {Cspa{crkl{Cing {Wc{wl{We{wa{Wr {Bwa{bte{Br{x.  The {RPrie{rst of Dra{Rgons{x is walking
around tending to the injured and helping out the people new to the clan hall.
You can hear sounds of battle and fighting comming from the {RTrai{rning R{Room{x on
either side of you.  Along the eastern wall are dark stone steps leading to
the {RTo{rwer {ROf {DB{Won{De{x.
803.name: {!The R{1ealm of Ni{!sstyre{x

description: You stumble across a small niche in the shop, leading to a secret
warehouse.  The dilapidated look and the thick stink of musty air
tells you beyond a doubt that it has been abandoned.
838.name: A small warehouse

description: The room is covered in mystic runes and markings, it is equally covered
in blast markings and acid etchings from the incrediblely powerful
mages that have graced this room.  The room is surronded by a magic
field that prevents their magics from destroying the very fortress.
813.name: {RSpel{rls {RRoom{x

description: You really shouldn't be in here.
819.name: Storage Room

description: You are standing in a cold stone hallway, the sound of your
footsteps echoes as you walk.  To the west is the mystical
{!Roo{1m of Port{!als{x where our mages can transport you to anywhere
in the {BRe{bal{Bms{x. To the north is {!The R{1ealm of Ni{!sstyre{x, where
only the most powerful and skilled, the highest of high, the
chosen ones may enter.  On the east wall is a dark stone
staircase that slightly glows from within.  Below you is
the {!Donatio{1n Pit of t{!he Keep{x.
804.name: {RCorr{ridor in the {RKeep{x

description: You enter the Shop Of Nightmares.  The walls are covered in
different items up for sale.  Shelves of different armor, potions,
weapons and other stuff to aid the clan members.  The shopkeeper,
an old human warrior, sits behind the counter polishing a sword,
waiting for someone to ask for something.
855.name: {RE{rquipment {Ro{rf {bN{8ightmares{x

description: The warehouse abruptly ends here.  The empty wall with its many
holey wooden planks promises no more adventure.
841.name: Far corner of the warehouse

description: You are standing in a cold stone hallway, the sound of your
footsteps echo as you walk.  The hole in the floor is accually a place
you can jump off to quickly get to the {!Gate{1s to the Fort{!ress{x, to
assist the guardians in protecting the {!K{1eep{x.  To the south is
{!The K{1eep of Dra{!gons{x, to the east is the {!Aren{1a of the Dra{!gons{x,
to the north the corridor continues.
805.name: {RCorr{ridor in the {RKeep{x

description: You stand in a large keep made of thick stone that looks like it
could withstand the impact force of Ragnarok itself.  The walls and
floor are covered in a moss that look to have been growing for a long
time.  To the north and south are the long hallways commonly called the
{!Corr{1idor in the {!Keep{x.  In the center of the room is a huge statue of
our founder, {bN{8isstyre{x, next to that is a fountain quietly bubbling with {^spa{6rkl{^ing
{&c{7l{&e{7a{&r {Bwa{bte{Br{x, and on the floor are {@green leaves{x that form into small cots.
802.name: {!The K{1eep of Dra{!gons{9

A twisted figure stands before you, staring at you with red drow eyes.

a finger at you, and points.  His voice hisses, not even alive voice, but
the sound of wind behind pushed through a corpses lungs, he breaths at your,
and tells you to begone, or show your tattoo of the Dragon's Hoard.
